ygData.subject: Re: rumors
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I just happened across her and killed her and got that lens. I don t however have any of the other ones and now when I ask about the quest I get a message
ygData.messageBody:
Rick Jones wrote:
> Actually, the Observer staff is ANOTHER lens quest, not
> the spare lens one. But the DE in Freeport, I've never found.
> I hear that people have found her, killed her and gotten the
> lens. I'm sure I can kill her, but I can't find her.

I just happened across her and killed her and got that lens. I
don't however have any of the other ones and now when I ask
about the quest I get a message saying you are too high level.

I've heard the "come back later" gnomes actually have a lens
every so often, but I don't believe it. I've never heard anyone
who has gotten a lens from them. I always figured I had to be
higher level. I left Faydwer for Antonica around level 10 and came
back around level 16 and they said I was too powerful now. I guess
I'll never be able to join my guild there *g*

I read someone finally got their tinkering skill to go up. I've
burnt through about 24 plat of Flameless Lanterns and had nothing
go up. Anyone know how long it takes? Is it just luck?

- Chad
